org.cdnomlqko.jglutil.data

Class Light

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cdnomlqko.jglutil.data.Light
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bufferable

    public class Light
extends java.lang.Object
implements Bufferable
    This class holds the properties of a light, made to be passed to shaders.
    Author:
    CDnoMlqko
